revision.text: ==Atakapa== ===Etymology=== Swanton suggests a possible connection to {{m|aqp|yik||trade}}. ===Noun=== {{head|aqp|noun}} # {{lb|aqp|Akokisa}} [[Spaniard]](s) ===References=== * ''Anthropological Linguistics'', volume 47 (2005), page 38: Herbert E. Bolton found two Akokisa words in Spanish records: (Yegsa) 'Spaniard(s)' and (Quiselpoo).
